name: Marin Companion
author: Marin

sections.description:
This is companion plugin is created for Marin theme.
The plugin add custom frontpage sections for Marin theme and it will allow you full customizer settings for the theme front page sections.
The plugin options are user-friendly and you can use this plugin for all marin child themes also.

Have any queries?
sections.changelog:
version 0.0.4
Plugin Live
Demo data Added
Default images path fixed
Clipart images added

version 0.0.3
Remaining issue fixed

version 0.0.2
Plugin Team Issue Fixed

Start with version 0.0.1
This is an initial release.
